segments.text: As I watch the water, I think about the potential damage it could cause to the cabinets below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of it flowing over the edge fills me with a sense of dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the woman remains blissfully unaware, lost in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression never changes, but my heart races as the children plot their cookie theft.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy teetering on that stool, and I can’t help but feel a sense of disbelief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is impressive, but so risky!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, I can’t suppress a smile at the girl’s eager hand reaching up, full of innocence and hope.
segments.speaker: PAR
